column4: what can i do to install this program i get this message http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/12997
you might get a better response if you give a brief description of your problem.  some people aren't going to fire up their browsers to look at your paste if they have no idea what it's about.
you could try to install libqt3-mt, or you could grab an opera package that doesn't depend on it - I think they provide statically compiled packages with no dependencies
